alert.note: Alert for Greene; Jasper; Morgan; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Morgan, Putnam, south central Greene and east central Jasper Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 722 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Eatonton, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Shady Dale, Phoenix, Rock Eagle 4-H Center, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, Harmony, Godfrey, Warfield, Willard and Parks Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
